scenario_text.value: ...Looks like everyone’s okay.
Yeah...
Okay...
*sniff*... *sob*...
Dammit!

The throne room is off-limits now...
The hole’s caved in, from the looks of it.
...Let’s go, Takuma.
Yeah, but I...!

What happened to Jijimon is awful, but we
have to keep our chins up and move on.
We... We have to keep going.
That’s all we can do.

But I...I couldn’t save them...
*sniff*...

Is there really time to stay here and feel
sorry for ourselves, Takuma?

Don’t we... Don’t you have something you have
to do now?

Yes... You’re right. Jijimon... Jijimon
entrusted his cause to us.

We have to make it a reality. And we have to
save Miyuki!

Then you can’t let that hope be for nothing,
can you? So stand up, and let’s go.
Yeah...let’s go!

Hey Takuma, about Jijimon...
Are you all right?

...This is no time to get depressed. You guys
had it way worse while I was gone.

To think something like this would happen
after you made it back to us...
I have no regrets about coming back.

It certainly is reassuring to have you back.
We’re not the same without you here.

It may be cruel to say after all you’ve been
through, but...please don’t go again.
...Dang, Miu sure looks unhappy.

I’m... I’m sorry about Jijimon. If only I’d
been more...
Stop right there, man.

I ain’t gonna cry over spilled milk, and
neither should you.

We’re looking ahead...towards the future.
We’ll need you for that, man.
Yeah, I know. Thanks, Kaito.
Takuma. Are you, uh...all right?
Yeah, I’m... I’m all right, Saki.

You’re so full of it. Even I can tell you’re
not acting like you’re usual self.

I think...Jijimon was happy. He was able to
entrust the future to you in the end, Takuma.

If he hadn’t been able to, well...
I think he was relieved.

...Yeah, you’re right. At least I’d like to
think so. Thanks, Saki.

(Saki’s trying to encourage me...
I’d better get my act together, and fast.)
Nnn... *sniff*... Jijimon...

I’m sorry, Miu. After coming all the way back
here, nothing’s gotten better...

That’s not true...
It isn’t your fault, Takuma.

And besides, you coming back took lots of
courage. I’m...I’m happy you did.

You don’t know how glad I am to hear you say
that.

I’m the happy one. I mean, Kaito and everyone
has been trying so hard...

But things were different without you.
That’s how I feel, anyway.

Hey... You okay, man? I can’t believe things
got this twisted right after you got back.

Sorry, Minoru. Really, I appreciate you
looking out for me.

I can’t tell you how pumped I was to see you
again, man.

So when all this went down, I was afraid you
regretted coming back in the first place.

Not a chance. I’d never regret coming back to
all of you.

...Yeah. Ha ha, yeah, that’s what I’m talking
about! That’s my man Takuma right there!
Next time, we’ll all go back together!
